Kitchen vocabulary

 

Let's name some things in a kitchen.

Vocabulary Section 1
 

labowl

bowl

 
 

g'p'tai

ceiling

 
 

mutputi

chair

 
 

nagu'setewei

clock

 
 

eplugutimg

counter

 
 

tegpa'q samuqan

cold water

 
 

gapji'j

cup

 
 

eptaqano'guom

cupboard

 
 

ga'qan

door

 
 

ugsuateja'taqan

drawer

 
 

samuqwan weja'tmg

faucet

 
 

naqana'pemgewei

faucet

 
 

alasenmamgewei

flashlight

 
 

migwije'maqan

fork

 
 

gljistaqanei

freezer

 
 

lapue'l

frying pan

 
 

lapue'lji'j

frying pan

 
 

mjegeio'q

garbage can

 
 

tumletji'j

glass

 
 

epteg samuqwan

hot water

 
 

etloqsewo'guom

kitchen

 
 

wa'qan

knife

 
 

wasoqn

light

 
 

oven

epipno'guom

 
 

eptaqan

plate

 
 

wow

pot

 
 

tegistegeg

refrigerator

 
 

pisew

sponge

 
 

amqwanji'j

spoon

 
 

mutputi'j

stool

 
 

epsaqtejg

stove

 
 

pata'uti

table

 
 

pawtiewegn

tablecloth

 
 

wisawoqsewemgewei

toaster

 
 

tmsaqign

wall

 
 

tuop'ti

window
